mapper.insert: insert into project_tb (user_id, title, contents, category_id, goal, date_end, project_image) values (#{userId}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{categoryId}, #{goal}, #{dateEnd}, #{projectImage})
mapper.select: select project_id, user.name as 'author', title, goal, date_end, project_image, category_id, collected_amount from project_tb as project join user_tb as user on project.user_id = user.user_id
select project.*, user.name as 'author' from project_tb as project join user_tb as user on project.user_id = user.user_id where project_id = #{projectId}
mapper.update: update project_tb SET title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, category_id = #{categoryId}, goal = #{goal}, date_end = #{dateEnd}, project_image = #{projectImage} WHERE project_id = #{projectId}
